member.name: M:UniSpline.BezierQ.Update(System.Single)
member.summary: Updates the Bezier curve and returns the next point (Vector3)

member.name: M:UniSpline.BezierQ.GetTangent
member.summary: Returns the normalized tangent vector of the bezier curve at the current time. If time is less than or equal to zero or greater than the time limit, then will return the zero vector.

member.name: T:UniSpline.BezierQ
member.summary: Implementation of a quadratic bezier curve using Vector3 points for the two end points and the control point.

member.name: M:UniSpline.CatmullRomSpline.UpdateCurve(System.Single)
member.summary: Updates the curve and returns the next Vector3 point on the curve.

member.name: T:UniSpline.CatmullRomSpline
member.summary: Implementation of Catmull-Rom spline using an array of Vector3 contorl points.
